#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

#define Sd(x)       scanf("%d",&x);
#define F(i,a,n)    for(int i=a;i<n;i++)
#define FD(i,a,n)   for(int i=a;i>=n;i--)

//-----RELEVANT CODE-----

inline int max(int a,int b)
{
    return (a>b)?a:b;
}
int main()
{
    //freopen("inp.txt","r",stdin);
    int t,m,n,i,j;
    Sd(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d %d",&m,&n);
        int a[m][n],score[m][n];
        F(i,0,m)
            F(j,0,n)
                scanf("%d",&a[i][j]);
        FD(i,m-1,0)
        {
            FD(j,n-1,0)
            {
                if(i==m-1 && j==n-1)
                    score[i][j]=a[i][j];
                else if(i==m-1)
                    score[i][j]=a[i][j]-score[i][j+1];
                else if(j==n-1)
                    score[i][j]=a[i][j]-score[i+1][j];
                else
                    score[i][j]=a[i][j]-max(score[i+1][j],score[i][j+1]);
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n",score[0][0]);
    }
    return 0;
}
